name: Chipotle Turkey Sandwich
ingredients: 1 serving Carbquik Artisan Flat Bread, Carbquik Cheddar Bun or Flax Sandwich Bun
1 thin slice pepper jack cheese, 3/4 ounce
1 1/2 ounces thinly sliced smoked deli turkey, preferably sugar free *
1 thin slice red onion, optional, about 1/2 ounce

instructions.en: Split the bread or bun into two thin slices.
Spread the Chipotle Mayo on both bun halves.
Add a slice of pepper jack cheese.
Layer the sliced smoked deli turkey.
If desired, add a thin slice of red onion.

notes: * Use Boar's Head brand turkey, which has no sugar or carbs. If you can't get sugar-free smoked turkey, add a carb to the counts. This recipe makes 1 serving. Do not freeze.
